itemDescription: A certificate for a month of unlimited yoga classes. Big Shoulders Yoga strives to create a community that is as hard working on the mat as it is off of it. It's not about ability or appearance, it's about consistency and willingness to try something new. Let's listen to our bodies, move in a way that feels good, and reverse some of the daily strain we put on ourselves. All while building connections with others doing the same.

A gift certificate for a candle making class for two people. The Black Luxe Candle Making Experience is a candle making workshop that includes all the supplies for one person to make a candle. During the class you will choose your favorite fragrance and vessel, then measure, mix, and pour your very own candle in an instructor-led class.

Say 'bonjour' to the best gift of all: the Bon Femmes Gift Card! It's a perfect way to give your special someone the freedom to choose what they really want. Whether spending it online or in-store, it's never been easier to gift the perfect present. Voilà!

itemTitle: Chicago State University Athletics Sports Package (Valued at $500)
itemDescription: Enjoy an exclusive Chicago State University package featuring 2 tickets to a November basketball game (dates to be confirmed), Raising Canes Chicken Fingers swag items, 2 CSU hats, 2 CSU shirts, and 2 CSU hoodies. Also included is a sleek Nike backpack and 2 pairs of Nike InfinityRN 4 Black Running Shoes, available in both men's and women's sizes, with all clothing items customizable to fit the winner's preference.

A $100 gift card to Demera Ethopian Resteraunt. Demera serves traditional Ethiopian cuisine using only the freshest, high quality, and authentic ingredients. For many of the guests experiencing Demera Ethiopian Restaurant, for the first time or as repeat customers, what impresses and fascinates them the most is not only the exciting flavors, excellent service, and exotic traditions of Ethiopia but also the experience of communal “family-style” hand-eaten meals shared among family and friends.

The signature 32-piece exotic truffles collection is inspired by Katrina’s travels around the world. The proprietary blend of chocolate, exotic spices, herbs, roots, and botanicals are sourced for their superior qualities from her travels worldwide. Each exotic chocolate truffle collection includes an enclosed book with guided tasting notes, ingredient sourcing details, and experiential truffle stories and pairings.

Enjoy a hand-thrown ceramic casserole dish from Andrea Price Pottery in color Antique White (retail $60). Perfect for dips, warm brie, as a serving dish, or whatever you want! Dishwasher, microwave, and oven safe!
Enjoy a jewelry set from Kendra Scott featuring (1) pair of Ari Heart Gold Stud Earrings and (1) Ari Heart Pendant Necklace.
A $30 restaurant certificate from Mom n' Pop Hospitality that can be used at Fiya, Geraldines Cafe or Jerry's Sandwiches. These restaurants are in a variety of locations on the north-side.

Receive 2 complimentary 30-minute coaching sessions with certified life/professional coach Liz Coffey of On Leave Experiences. Coaching is all about looking to the future and asking what you want for yourself + identifying the steps you can take now to get there. Your sessions can focus on any topics that are helpful to you.

itemTitle: Overflow Candle Co Gift Box (Valued at $100)
itemDescription: A candle gift box with 3 long-lasting candles. (1) Sun-Drenched (watermint and clementine) 16 oz (1) Lazy, Hazey, Crazy (toasted coconut and midnight amber) 16 oz, and (1) Kakadu Plum and Amber (coconut soy) 4 oz.
A $100 gift card to Pizza Lobo's locations in Andersonville and Logan Square.
Tote bag filled with Sin Titulo goodies!

A $25 gift card to Soap Distillery. Soap Distillery creates quality body and home goods with a focus on responsibly made, refined aromas in eco-forward packaging solutions. Every move we make is one made with intention. From sustainably sourced ingredients, to responsible manufacturing processes, to fully compostable packaging, we are committed to offering quality, planet-friendly goods.

A $250 gift card to Spa Soak, a full service spa located in the Bucktown/Wicker Park neighborhood. We provide a full range of treatments; each custom blended and tailored to your needs using the highest quality essential oils, plant extracts, vitamins and minerals.

A gift basket from Sqeaky Beas that includes (1) Primal Freeze Dried Turkey Topper, (1) Weruva Low Me Tender can (1) Acana Silicone Lid Saver (1) Green Coast Pets Chicken Chips (1) The Woff Beef Love Nuggets (1) Braided Bully From Bully Bundles (1) FabDog Giraffe Faball (1) Greenline Pet Poo Bag Roll.

You don’t have to look further for the perfect gift for your bestie! This gift set comes boxed & pretty with our signature blends including Sukha (rose, rose quartz & patchouli), Karma (citrus, moonstone & rosemary) and Dewdrop (vanilla, aquamarine & sandalwood). A fresh stick of palo santo is included along with our branded sticker. Let the giving begin (or a little self-love doesn’t hurt either)!

A $50 gift card to The Colette Collection. This boutique features styles from up-and-coming fashion brands to deliver the highest quality at reasonable prices. Two people have a chance to win this prize!

A $50 e-gift card to The Refilleri. Specializing in lifestyle, personal care, bulk foods, and home goods, they bring you high quality items with little impact to the Earth. All items in the store are compostable, refillable or reusable!

itemTitle: Unbothered Foods Crackers Variety Pack and Charcutiere Board
itemDescription: Variety Pack of sourdough crackers in flavors Garlic, Sea Salt, and Cheddar & Chive, along with a curated Charcuterie board for 6-10 people.

A coffee kit with a roast of winner's choice, tumbler, phin brewer, and sweetened condensed milk. Value at $60. Roast Types for Winner to Choose From: (1) Early Heaven - Medium Roast, (2) Sacred Waters - Light Roast, (3) People & Boats - Dark Roast.
